Text: If you've downloaded episodes 1-5 from me, please create a new folder where your downloads are, name it "Please Like Me", move your files there and re-check. Only episode 6 will be left for download. Thanks for seeding!

Thanks for creating this, I appreciate your upload.

However, I wish you followed the guidelines in "The SD x264 TV Releasing Standards 2012" document. http://scenerules.irc.gs/t.html?id=2012_SDTVx264r.nfo
Dear coldpluto, thank you for the tip. I will do my best to comply with the guidelines next time.
The number 6 is here. You can see the files list by clicking next to "Files:" at the top of this page.
